items.name: Visual Studio Code
items.description: Before it was Sublime 3, then IntelliJ but VS Code gave most of the things I needed for development.

items.name: Clover
items.description: Because I prefer multiple tabs than multiple windows.

items.name: Hyper
items.description: To be honest, there are better terminals out there but this one has a pikachu theme.

title: Services
description: I'm a sucker for free stuff. Am I just cheap? Probably. But the free plans are usually enough for me; most of the services listed here have a free plan.

items.name: zeit.co
items.description: I used to host everyting on Github but I really like zeit's ssr, auto deploy stuff. I might move to netlify in the future.

items.name: Figma
items.description: If I thought of a layout or concept, I will spend hours doing it directly on HTML and CSS-only to scrap it because I don't like it. Thankful I found Figma.

items.name: Namecheap
items.description: I think the price are fair and sometimes there's a sale. Their dashboard is good too.

items.name: Grammarly
items.description: I'm not that good at English. Even if I am, I also make mistakes sometime. Grammarly has your back.

items.name: Forestry.io
items.description: Best for static site generators. You can make new posts on your phone!

items.name: Logitech G604
items.description: So many buttons! Ever since I got a mouse with two side buttons, I never went back and kept looking for even more buttons. Programmable side buttons, dpi change, and more good stuff.

items.name: ikbc mf87 (White)
items.description: An 80% mechanical keyboard. Heavy as hell. If you ever drop this on your toe, it's a guaranteed hospital visit.

items.name: Tai-Hao Paradise PBT
items.description: Not really necessary but I like to make things pretty.

items.name: KRK Rokit 5
items.description: These are monitors by the way, not speakers. I turned them into my everyday speaker with just few eq adjustments. I used to have this hobby where I needed this kind of monitors.

title: To consider
description: Havent used yet but want to
